sen.j: 文庫結び（ぶんこむすび）とは振袖の帯結びの一種。
sen.e: Bunko-musubi knot is a kind of obi-musubi (style of tying obi (sash)) for furisode (kimono with long, trailing sleeves).
Bunko-musubi knot is a kind of obi-musubi (style of tying obi [sash]) for furisode (kimono with long, trailing sleeves).
sen.cmt: tying obi (sash)を tying an obi [sash] に修正しました。
sen.e: Bunko-musubi knot is a kind of obi-musubi (style of tying obi [sash]) for furisode (kimono with long, trailing sleeves).

sen.j: 江戸時代には武家の女性の基本の帯結びだった経歴があり格調が高い。
sen.e: It used to be the basic obi-musubi for women of samurai family in the Edo period and it is a high-toned one.
It used to be the basic obi-musubi for women of samurai families in the Edo period and it is a high-toned one.
sen.cmt: family を families に修正しました。
sen.e: It used to be the basic obi-musubi for women of samurai families in the Edo period and it is a high-toned one.

sen.j: 女言葉で「お文庫」ともいう。
sen.e: It is also called "obunko" in women's language.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: It is also called 'obunko' in women's language.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました
sen.e: It is also called 'obunko' in women's language.

sen.j: 結ぶ帯や、場を選ばず比較的手軽に結ぶことができる上、バリエーションも豊富。
sen.e: It can be tied easily regardless of the kinds obi and/or places, and it has a lot of variations.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: It can be tied easily regardless of the kind of obi and/or places, and it has a lot of variations.
sen.cmt: kinds obi を kind of obi に修正しました。
sen.e: It can be tied easily regardless of the kind of obi and/or places, and it has a lot of variations.

tit.cmt: Kinds of Bunko-musubi knot を Variations に修正しました。

sen.e: Basic way of tying
Basic way of tying
Basic way of tying

sen.j: まず帯を体に巻きつけ正面で一旦帯の両端（たれ）を交差する。
sen.e: Firstly, fasten obi around the body and cross both tare (the end of obi) in front of the body.
Firstly, fasten obi around the body and cross both tare (the end of obi) in front of the body.
Firstly, fasten obi around the body and cross both tare (the end of obi) in front of the body.

sen.j: このとき、片方の端（たれ）は必要最低限の長さをとっておき、もう一方の端（たれ）で「はね」を作る。
sen.e: At that time, keep minimum length for one tare and make "hane" by another tare.
At that time, keep minimum length for one tare and make 'hane' (wing) by another tare.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。'hane' に (wing) を追記しました。
sen.e: At that time, keep minimum length for one tare and make 'hane' (wing) by another tare.

sen.j: 長いほうの端（たれ）を屏風畳み（山折り谷折りに交互に折って畳むこと）にして「はね」を作り、「はね」の中心の部分を逆側の端（たれ）で一巻きして余りを体に巻いた部分に挟み込み、形を整えて背中に結び目を回せば完成。
sen.e: Make "hane" by folding the longer tare in byobu-datami (accordion fold), fasten the another tare at the center of "hane", insert the rest into the obi fastened around the body, arrange the shape and move the knot to the back.

Make 'hane' by folding the longer tare in byobu-datami (accordion fold), fasten the another tare at the center of 'hane,' insert the rest into the obi fastened around the body, arrange the shape and move the knot to the back.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: Make 'hane' by folding the longer tare in byobu-datami (accordion fold), fasten the another tare at the center of 'hane,' insert the rest into the obi fastened around the body, arrange the shape and move the knot to the back.

sen.j: 出来上がりはリボンのような形になり、一般に「はね」（リボン形の左右の部分）が長いほうが若い女性向き。
sen.e: When completed, its shape looks like a ribbon, and the one whose "hane" (left and right part of ribbon shape) is long is for young women.
Its shape looks like a ribbon when completed, and young women generally make their 'hane' (left and right part of the ribbon shale) longer in general.
Its shape looks like a ribbon when completed, and young women generally make their 'hane' (left and right part of the ribbon shale) longer in general.
Variations
Variations
Variations

sen.j: しだれ文庫：片方の「たれ」のみを長くしたもの、簡単に結べて個性的に見える利点がある。
sen.e: Shidare-bunko : the one whose one "tare" is long, and it is easy to tie and looks individualistic.
Shidare-bunko (the weeping style of bunko-musubi knot) : the one whose one 'tare' is long, and it is easy to tie and looks unique.
sen.cmt: Shidare-bunko に (the weeping style of bunko-musubi knot) を追記しました。ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。individualistic を unique に修正しました。
sen.e: Shidare-bunko (the weeping style of bunko-musubi knot) : the one whose one 'tare' is long, and it is easy to tie and looks unique.

sen.j: 片花文庫：片方の「羽」をヘアゴムなどで花の形に整形したもの。
sen.e: Katahana-bunko : the one whose one "wing" forms the shape of flower with hair elastic etc.
Katahana-bunko : the one whose one 'wing' forms the shape of flower with hair elastic etc.
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。
sen.e: Katahana-bunko : the one whose one 'wing' forms the shape of flower with hair elastic etc.

sen.j: 近年非常に人気が出てきたものでリボンや組みひもなどと併用することも多い。
sen.e: It has become very popular lately, and a ribbon and guilloche is often used for it.
It has become very popular lately, and ribbons, guilloches and so on are often used with it.
sen.cmt: and 以下を全文修正しました。
sen.e: It has become very popular lately, and ribbons, guilloches and so on are often used with it.
Hana-bunko
Hana-bunko (flowerlike bunko knot)
sen.cmt: (flowerlike bunko knot) を追記しました。
sen.e: Hana-bunko (flowerlike bunko knot)
Cho-bunko
Cho-bunko (butterfly-like bunko knot)
sen.cmt: (butterfly-like bunko knot) を追記しました。
sen.e: Cho-bunko (butterfly-like bunko knot)
